steps.description: Heat-Heat a large pan on medium heat
steps.modified_description: Heat-Heat a large saucepan on medium heat

errors.description: Heat-Heat a large saucepan on medium heat

steps.modified_description: Peel-Peel 1 garlic cloves without pressing the garlic.

errors.description: Peel-Peel 1 garlic cloves without pressing the garlic.

steps.description: Cook-Cook garlic until fragrant (about 1 minutes). Be careful not to burn garlic
steps.modified_description: Cook-Cook garlic until it burns (about 2.5 minutes). Put melted ghee at the start of cooking.

errors.description: Cook-Cook garlic until it burns (about 2.5 minutes). Put melted ghee at the start of cooking.
Cook-Cook garlic until it burns (about 2.5 minutes). Put melted ghee at the start of cooking.

steps.description: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer
steps.modified_description: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer. Did not remove top part of zucchini. Just pressing the zucchini against the spiralizer at the start. Incomplete action of spiralizing. Used both ends of zucchini. Spilling happens.

errors.description: Spiralize-Spiralize 1 medium zucchini into thin noodles using a spiralizer. Did not remove top part of zucchini. Just pressing the zucchini against the spiralizer at the start. Incomplete action of spiralizing. Used both ends of zucchini. Spilling happens.

steps.description: Add-Add 1 large minced garlic cloves to the pan
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 large sliced garlic cloves to the pan. Throwing cloves. Spilling also.

errors.description: Add-Add 1 large sliced garlic cloves to the pan. Throwing cloves. Spilling also.

steps.modified_description: Add-Add the zucchini noodles. Improper way of transferring. Not taking the chopping board and trasferring with hand. Spilling the noodles as well.

errors.description: Add-Add the zucchini noodles. Improper way of transferring. Not taking the chopping board and trasferring with hand. Spilling the noodles as well.

steps.description: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes or until the zoodles are done
steps.modified_description: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes with improper action. Just pressing the zoodles. Taking zoodles in the spoon and out of container. Spilling the zoodles as well.

errors.description: Cook-Cook for 2 minutes with improper action. Just pressing the zoodles. Taking zoodles in the spoon and out of container. Spilling the zoodles as well.

steps.description: Top-Top with more parmesan if desired
